text:
Hello fellow content geniuses and wizards! I am a content writer specializing in design, visual culture, and the way they intersect with tech. Oh, I also write about "corporate values" for conference networks, that's a nice change of pace. My strengths mainly lie in 700-1200-word blogs and articles AND in 400-ish character product descriptions. In my old (and maybe parallel) life, I was an arts journalist for The Guardian, ArtNews, WSJ, Garage, Artsy, etc etc etc. Of Course, my DMs are open

You can take a look at my work here: <http://www.angelicafrey.com|www.angelicafrey.com>

text: Hi all! Looking for some freelance (or possibly in-house) design opportunities. Specialities include ebooks, landing pages and other marketing design for SaaS startups. Please DM me if you feel like we’d be a good fit! You can check out my portfolio here: <https://puddlea.com/>

attachments.fallback: PUDDLEA | the art and design of mekkie bansil
attachments.text: Mekkie Bansil is a San Francisco-based artist and designer with a penchant for copy. See how she uses her skills to help scrappy startups get more leads and inspire starry-eyed dreamers with magical paintings
attachments.title: PUDDLEA | the art and design of mekkie bansil

text:
Howdy,

Experienced SaaS content marketer (I've written for Notion, Copper, Knotch, and a few other brands you may have heard of ) here looking for new writing projects where the end audience is in marketing, sales, or part of the creator economy. DM me if interested.

text:
Hello #hire-me community!

I'm on the hunt for a new opportunity. I've had 10+ years in marketing (digital & traditional), email marketing, social media, campaign management, proofreading & editing, design, and content management. If anyone knows of any available opportunities that could potentially be a match (full time or on a freelance basis), please DM me. Thanks so much in advance! :nerd_face:

[remote] [lookingforajob]
